author: allee8285
msg: OPENJPA-2163 Change LifecycleEventManager PluginValue's singleton default value from true to false. Add SingletonLifecycleEventManager property allow previous property to switch singleton value back to true. Since LifecycleEventManager is a internal property for BeanValidation support, the SingletonLifecycleEventManager property will be kept as internal property as well.

author: markt
msg: Tweak the test so it can easily be run multiple times in a row without failing.
